remarks:
A standard version of the Axiom of Infinity, using definitions to abbreviate.  Axiom Inf of [BellMachover] p. 472.  (See ~ ax-inf2 for the unabbreviated version.)  (Contributed by NM, 30-Aug-1993.) 

---

 A standard version of the Axiom of Infinity, using definitions to abbreviate.  Axiom Inf of [BellMachover] p. 472.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Aug-1993.)
statement:
zfinf2 $p |- E. x ( (/) e. x /\ A. y e. x suc y e. x ) $.
$d x y $.
